title: Adjustments of Certain Rates of Pay

enrichment.summary: This executive order updates and sets new pay rates for various federal employee categories, including general schedule workers, senior executives, judges, military personnel, and others, effective starting in January 2023. It ensures that government salaries and locality pay adjustments reflect current standards and replaces a prior similar order from 2021.
potential_concerns: Increases in pay rates could place additional budgetary pressure on federal payroll expenses.
Disparities in locality-based comparability payments might lead to perceptions of unfairness among federal employees in different regions.
Implementation complexity may arise in coordinating updated pay schedules across diverse federal agencies and pay systems.
The adjustment may prompt demands for further retroactive pay corrections or related benefits from certain employee groups.
Lack of transparency or clarity about how pay rates were determined could lead to employee dissatisfaction or criticism.
